name: SunShine Ultra Violet Burn
text: If this card is activated: Both players take 1000 damage. While this card is in your GY, you can target 1 banished "SunShine" card; place that card on the bottom of your Deck. If this card activates an effect in the GY: You can banish this card; send 1 "SunShine" card from your field to your GY. You can only use each effect of "SunShine Ultra Violent Burn" once per turn.
